content.query:
--IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE NAME = 'Staging.UserData' AND TYPE = 'U')
CREATE TABLE Staging.UserData
	(
	 registration_dttm datetime2,
	 id int,
	 first_name nvarchar(30),
	 last_name nvarchar(30),
	 email nvarchar(30),
	 gender nvarchar(30),
	 ip_address nvarchar(30),
	 cc nvarchar(30),
	 country nvarchar(30),
	 birthdate nvarchar(30),
	 salary float,
	 title nvarchar(30),
	 comments nvarchar(30)
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	 CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	 -- HEAP
	)
GO

--Uncomment the 4 lines below to create a stored procedure for data pipeline orchestrationâ€‹                 
--CREATE PROC bulk_load_UserData
--AS
--BEGIN
COPY INTO Staging.UserData
(registration_dttm 1, id 2, first_name 3, last_name 4, email 5, gender 6, ip_address 7, cc 8, country 9, birthdate 10, salary 11, title 12, comments 13)
FROM 'https://edupocdatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/parquetfiles/*.parquet'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'PARQUET'
	,MAXERRORS = 1000
	,COMPRESSION = 'snappy'
	,IDENTITY_INSERT = 'OFF'
)
--END
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM Staging.UserData
GO
